file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 52-40-03-04 - REAR FUSELAGE ACCESS DOOR/PANELS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL REAR FUSELAGE ACCESS DOOR/PANELS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the Rear Fuselage access doors. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY REAR FUSELAGE ACCESS DOORS - RE- ALL 52-40-03-000-801-A MOVAL REAR FUSELAGE ACCESS DOORS - IN- ALL 52-40-03-400-801-A STALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 52-40-03 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-40-03-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. REAR FUSELAGE ACCESS DOORS - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the rear fuselage access doors. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - SRM 51-40-07 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272AR Rear fuselage 272 272BR Rear fuselage 272 272CR Rear fuselage D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Rear fuselage I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Make sure that the aircraft is safe for maintenance. (2) Open the Rear Fuselage access doors 272AR, 272BR, and 272CR. Refer to AMM MPP 06-41-01/100. J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the rivets (1) that attach access door (2) on rear fuselage. Refer to SRM 51-40-07. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-40-03 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Remove the access door (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-40-03 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Rear Fuselage Access Doors - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONE B 272 DET. A 1 1. RIVET 2. ACCESS DOOR DET. B (TYPICAL) 1 AERODYNAMIC LIMITS 145AMM520595.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-40-03 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-40-03-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. REAR FUSELAGE ACCESS DOORS - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the rear fuselage access doors. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - SRM 51-10-01 - SRM 51-40-07 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272AR Rear fuselage 272 272BR Rear fuselage 272 272CR Rear fuselage D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Rear fuselage I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the access door (2) and attach them with the rivets (1). Refer to SRM 51-40-07. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close the Rear Fuselage access doors 272AR, 272BR, and 272CR. Refer to AMM MPP 06-41-01/100. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 52-40-03 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Check the Aerodynamic Limits. Refer to SRM 51-10-01. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 52-40-03 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
